buttons.primary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-[#1A1A1A] text-white font-medium hover:bg-[#2D2D2D] transition-all duration-300 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-[#F5D5D5] text-[#1A1A1A] font-medium hover:bg-[#E8B4B4] transition-all duration-300 active:scale-95
buttons.outline: h-12 px-8 rounded-full border-2 border-[#1A1A1A] text-[#1A1A1A] font-medium hover:bg-[#1A1A1A] hover:text-white transition-all duration-300

cards.base: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-[#F5F5F5] shadow-[0_2px_8px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] p-6 hover:shadow-[0_8px_24px_rgba(0,0,0,0.06)] transition-all duration-300
cards.booking_slot: flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-4 rounded-xl border transition-all cursor-pointer

inputs.base: h-12 rounded-xl border-gray-200 bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#F5D5D5] focus:border-[#F5D5D5] transition-all

hero.alt: Woman doing yoga on blue mat

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Playfair Display' for all Headings (h1-h3) to establish the brand voice.
Use 'Manrope' for all body text and UI elements for readability.
Primary Action Buttons must be Dark Charcoal (#1A1A1A) to contrast with the soft pink theme.
Use the 'Bento' grid layout for the Admin Dashboard to organize bookings and stats.
The Calendar component should use soft pastel backgrounds for events (e.g., bg-[#F5D5D5]/20) and rounded corners.
Ensure all interactive elements have a 'data-testid' attribute.
Do not use default Shadcn styling; override with the specified border radii (rounded-xl/2xl) and shadows.
For the 'Available' slot status, use the Sage Green (#8FB392) color for text/icon to indicate positivity.
For the 'Booked' slot status (initials), use a neutral gray background with dark text.
Implement a 'Credit Balance' card that is prominent on the user dashboard.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts; use asymmetry where possible.
Use 2-3x more spacing (padding/margin) than standard to create a 'luxury' feel.
Add micro-interactions to all buttons and cards (hover lift, scale, shadow increase).
Ensure mobile responsiveness is prioritized for the booking flow.
